name: nycmesh-node-visualizer
description: NYCMesh is a community-driven, decentralized wireless network initiative based in New York City. It aims to provide affordable and accessible internet connectivity to residents and businesses by creating a mesh network. In a mesh network, individual nodes (routers) connect to each other, forming a web-like structure that can transmit data across the network without relying solely on traditional Internet service providers (ISPs).
